title: Great, but the new update is bad.
text: I am a long time user of the Gmail app and I love the ease with which I am able to read and write messages to my team. The new update however has severely hindered the clarity with which I was able to communicate. The in-line messages have made it so that anything I send to my team gets lost among the other messages my team sends. I would prefer that it revert back to when the messages appeared in their own separate boxes.

title: Badge problem
text:
Following the previous ios update, I noticed two issues with my iPhone 11. First, the badges on the Gmail app were not updating as they used to. Once I open Gmail and close it again, the badges then display the correct number of unread emails. I‚Äôve tried turning ‚Äúbadges‚Äù off and on from Notifications in settings, also turned the iphone (11) itself  off and on, neither corrected the problem. May not seem like a big deal, but I‚Äôm missing important email that require a timely response. The Gmail app is the only app with this issue. 

Second, at the very top of the ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù screen, I am not able to open the section that contains all my iPhone information  (Apple ID, iCloud, Media & Purchases). The letting is muted (gray vs white). For obvious reasons, this is problematic. 

Please advise. Thank you!

title: Why would gmail shut down my account for trying to change my password?
text: I set up a new email for work today. I wrote down my password and went to login and it wouldn‚Äôt accept my password so I pressed ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù and went through the process to create a new password and I got a pop up saying my account had been shut down and I had to submit an appeal. I had just put this new business email on a credit card application with Chase Bank and now I won‚Äôt be able to receive their reply. I can‚Äôt change the email on the application. I don‚Äôt understand how the process can be that inconvenient or sensitive. I was using the same device I set up the account with. I know I wrote and entered the password correctly. This is crazy
